params.name: text_config
params.description: Dictionary of configuration options used to initialize ClapTextConfig.

params.name: audio_config
params.description: Dictionary of configuration options used to initialize ClapAudioConfig.

params.name: logit_scale_init_value
params.description: The initial value of the logit_scale parameter. Default is used as per the original CLAP implementation.

params.name: projection_dim
params.description: Dimensionality of text and audio projection layers.

params.name: projection_hidden_act
params.description: Activation function for the projection layers.

params.name: initializer_factor
params.description: Factor to scale the initialization of the model weights.
